name: Mortem (itch) (JoleEh)
description:
Important info:

* You can heal for free inbetween waves, but it costs half your *cash* during waves.
* To run this game on Linux or Macintosh you need to install and run using Mono (`mono game.exe` in terminal).

Font by [Daniel Linssen](https://managore.itch.io/). Music made using [Beepbox](beepbox.co). Some sound effects generated using [sfxr](http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html) and [bfxr](https://www.bfxr.net/).
